CHAT.comment: what is vampier faivrite candy a secker [= last two words are written upside down on the page like in a joke book; there are several erasures and cross outs on the page]

Chi balances tablet on raised knees. Chi feels very uncomfortable and doesn't want to write. EXP , INV2 and Mot suggest numerous ideas , but Chi refuses to write anything. After approximately seven and a half minutes of fussing (including a discussion about their avian pet , Larry Bird) , Chi suddenly decides to write a joke (INV2's suggestion) and does a good job; Chi complains <Ma how come you always make me sound it out>; Mot replies <because I used to be a teacher>
at first Chi chooses to sit at the table , but Mot points to the couch and Chi returns to sit next to her.

u.a: presumably the family has birds as pets , and they can sometimes be heard on the tape
sounds like Chi is writing or drawing with the pencil

g.ga: refers to the pencil which is dull

u.a: Chi sharpens pencil with electric pencil sharpener
